ocr_result: Waka Has Come To Stay ___ --- Salawa Abeni Waka Has Come To Stay ___ --- Salawa Abeni

The Waka Queen, Alhaja Salawa Abeni, has said that her brand of fuji music, Waka, has come to stay and there is no changing it. The Waka Queen, Alhaja Salawa Abeni, has said that her brand of fuji music, Waka, has come to stay and there is no changing it.

Speaking in an interview with PMSbow World, Salawa said that the criticism of the introduction of fuji music into waka is misplaced, adding that she has come to give. the men a good fight musically, so that they would know that women should not be relegated to the background. The waka queen fur- ther-said that she has modernised waka with modern musical instru- inents such as jazz, drums; piano, keyboard, etc.. The Gbagada bad boy, Charly Oputa a.k.a. Charly Boy appears to be under se- vere pressure from kids to change his weird image. PMShow World source close to the Gbagada home of Charly Boy disclosed that though determined to keep all Nigerian kids, outofschool due to teachers' strike ac- tion, positively busy, Charly Boy is worried that his weird image.would affect the kids. contract will enable Raypower to broad- cast the works of Nigerian artistes and their foreign counterparts without in- fringing on their copyright law. He said Nigerian artistes benefitting from the contract will be paid through the MCSN. The Chairman of MCSN, Otunba Sunday Adenlyl Adegeye (King Sunny - Adel, appealed to Raypower FM to please use more of Nigerian music so that the bulk of the money realisable from the contract in form of royalty can remain in the country. Present at the occasion were Prince Jide Adeniyi of Peatson Nigeria Limited, Engineer Adebayo Banjo of DISC Engl- neering, Sunny Aduns of BENTV. Apart from Dallas Obesere is sched- uled to perform at Irvington Staten Island, New Jersey, Brooklyn - all in New York state. Rick JamesPays Damages For Assault Rick JamesPays Damages For Assault

A woman who claimed that singer Rick James and his girlfriend beat her and held her hostage in a Hollywood hotel room La 1992 was awarded $225,000 in punitive damages by a jury last Tuesday. The verdict followed a $1.8 million award in compensatory damages on Friday to 36year-old Mary Sauger. James, best known for the 1981 hit "Super Freak," said through his lawyer that he would appeal. The 45-year-old-singer and his girlfriend Tanya Anne Hijazi, 23, were convicted last year of assaulting Sauger, and were sentenced in January tb five years and four years in prison, respectively. Crosby Leaves Hospital With New Liver I Crosby Leaves Hospital With New Liver I

P5 - Three weeks after undergoing a liver transplant, musician David Crosby was released from hospital last Tuesday. P5 - Three weeks after undergoing a liver transplant, musician David Crosby was released from hospital last Tuesday.

A spokeswoman said the prognosis for the 53-year-old former member | of Crosby, Stills and Nash was excellent. A spokeswoman said the prognosis for the 53-year-old former member | of Crosby, Stills and Nash was excellent.

Crosby was put through seven hours of surgery 20 November to replace - his liver, ravaged by years of drug and alcohol abuse. Crosby was put through seven hours of surgery 20 November to replace - his liver, ravaged by years of drug and alcohol abuse.

Mayhem Video Released I Mayhem Video Released I

- A new home video tape on the activities of cult members to Nigerian universities was last week released Into the ever growing Nigerian home video market. - A new home video tape on the activities of cult members to Nigerian universities was last week released Into the ever growing Nigerian home video market.

The video tape titled Maybem portrays the evil inherent in campus Cults, a disturbing phenomenon in Nigerian universities. Featuring renowned artistes like Joe Layole, Garuba of NTA Village Headmaster, Sam Bucknor, Sam Loco, Yemi Remi among others. The film which is produced in English Language takes a racy cut through the undulating landscape of Nigeria higher institutions, highlights the pranks of students and lecturers and throws one into the urge to become a cult member. It is a production of Felin International films. The video tape titled Maybem portrays the evil inherent in campus Cults, a disturbing phenomenon in Nigerian universities.
